item.title: Moderators/admins with testscape source?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Ok I will help because I am nice

Search:

1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

You will see something like this:

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“crazy owns”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jewsus”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wolfoboy”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“black amazin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ancient fire”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lilly”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
[/code]

Well replace you name with crazy owns or something. Or just put in the quotes “”. Then the playerRights is like this:

1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators/admins with testscape source?
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Open client.java search admin list …
should see sum stuff like

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mail”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

In this case, change mail to your name

Or… go into charectar files, look for playerRights = 0 change that to 1, 2 or 3. save. (to do that, the person must be logged off when you save).

Read full topic
